pageTitle: Best Financial Advisors in Huntington Beach
metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Huntington Beach. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Phil Gironda, AAMSÂ®

heroDescription: Huntington Beach, known as 'Surf City USA,' is a vibrant coastal city in Southern California.
landscapeDescription: The city boasts a diverse economy driven by tourism, retail, and technology. Its proximity to Los Angeles enhances its economic potential.
uniqueNeeds: Huntington Beach requires tailored financial advice due to its unique coastal economy and real estate market.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Huntington Beach's tourism reliance poses economic risks; real estate prices are high, creating bubble concerns. Prepare for natural disasters like flooding and wildfires.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Huntington Beach's economy has shown resilience with a 3% growth rate driven by tourism and retail sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Huntington Beach is approximately $85,000, reflecting a relatively affluent community.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in the area are increasingly focusing on real estate and retirement planning due to local market dynamics.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Huntington Beach is 15% higher than the national average, driven by housing and services.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the median home price in Huntington Beach is around $1.2 million, indicating a competitive and expensive market.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Huntington Beach's business climate is favorable, with a growing number of startups in tech and retail sectors.
